info.description: This is an fst-based speller for Southern Sámi made by Divvun/Giellatekno/UiT. It is based on the normative subset of the morphological analyser for Southern Sámi. The source code can be found at: https://victorio.uit.no/langtech/trunk/langs/sma/ License: GPL3+.
